_header: Saint John thus has in letters laid
_description: Gospel for the Third Sunday after Easter in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint iohn þus has in letters laidHow crist to his desciples said…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Bot litill porcioune of a dayAls by a tale here wit men may
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Modicum & non uidebitis me.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica ii post octava pasche Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 92ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.200-202.
